channel.title: trilinos on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in trilinos on Notes

item.title: Trilinos Teko
item.description: Teko is a Trilinos package that implements "blocked" and "segregated" preconditioners for iterative solvers. Preliminaries Was it enabled during confiugre/build?

item.title: Exploring Trilinos with Python - Epetra and AztecOO
item.description: Introduction This is an example from PyTrilinos tutorial with a more detailed and exploratory approach with steps outputs to help understand the program functionalities and dataflows.

item.title: Trilinos notes
item.description: Basics What is Trilinos? Object oriented framework for solving math and engineering problems (linear system of equations). Can solve problems up to 2 billion unknowns.
